welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Zandvoort, a charming coastal town known for its beautiful beaches and vibrant atmosphere. We invite you to immerse yourself in our city's unique charm and explore all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Schiphol's main terminal, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Dedicated to flights within the European Union.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serving intercontinental flights to destinations outside of Europe.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions.
